website_summaries.verdict: An affordable lantern that puts out a good amount of light, but it may be smaller than you expect.
pros: Comes in a black or rust patina finish
Steel construction with a weatherproof seal
Glass is clear, and the lantern puts out a lot of light
cons: Does not come with a bulb
Instructions are unclear and can be difficult to figure out
Lantern is on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice light for the price, perfect upgrade to that old bulb hanging from exposed wires on the back deck that you told the wife you'd fix 4 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cole A.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple black metal light with a bulb I could easily access. This has all of those things. This is the first time I have ever changed a porch light. I found the instructions to be hard to follow. I ended up watching a youtube video to help. Thank goodness for youtube tutorials. I would've given it 5 stars if the instructions would've been easier to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures in the instructions are hard to understand because they are not clear. That being said this was an amazin addition to the front of my house. Once I figured out what was what I was able to install this in no time! It ended up being so easy I can't complain about the 5 extra minutes I had to stare at the instructions. Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Cummings

customer_reviews.title: sleek design
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for the exterior front portion of our house. I love the design and the look of the lanterns. The only negative was that the base did not quite fit into the cut of the house and the lantern tilts downward instead of laying flush against the house. However, these do look very nice against the front of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Doc brandy

customer_reviews.title: They Look Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I received them (one for the front porch and one for the back stoop). I easily installed them. And I love how they look. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CLMCM

customer_reviews.title: ... light on our back porch and this was a perfect fit. It is a little smaller than I ...
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our light on our back porch and this was a perfect fit. It is a little smaller than I had anticipated, but it puts out a great deal of light for it's size. This light was the design we wanted without the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kimbell

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, and that's not bad
customer_reviews.text: A good deal for the price, reasonably well made and easy to install. It should have better weather sealing around top and sides of attachment plate. Also, it is not easy to seat the plate against the wall, especially if it is being attached (as it is in my case) to wooden shingles on the sidewall that are angled out from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Islander

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy Install. Like the open bottom for light dispersion, makes it easy to see the walkway. These are very popular and were out of stock, delivery was expected in 7 to 10 days well Amazon actually had them shipped from Las Vegas to meet the 2 day time for prime..Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: VERY worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well-packaged and in perfect order with all the necessary installation bits. Installation instructions were a bit on the major confusing side, obviously not written by an English-speaker, but the parts are so few it's easy to figure out. Took mere moments to install and is a delight to have, especially at the price paid. I've gotten similar at Walmart in recent times, for a much higher price and had to return for refund because of the quality. This little light will shine for quite some time. If I need more, I've no reservations about ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Judah Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Take extra care opening the package  and Installing.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. Descent product for the money. Here's the catch. After I installed the second unlit, I noticed that a couple of glass panels were dangling askew. Closer examination I noticed that two of the eight thumb nuts holding the panels in place were missing. I found one still inside the box, but still missing one! These nuts are barely screwed on by the manufacturer. Be sure to tighten all 8 before you attempt to install. Also note there are also rubber washers that go under the nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than expected, but otherwise an excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Many other reviewers have noted that the installation instructions were difficult to understand...I didn't find that to be the case, and installed two of the lights in under 30 minutes. Of course, this was not a new installation as I simply replaced existing exterior lights, but even with new installations, I think the instructions would be pretty easy to follow (and I've seen plenty of head scratching installation instructions and drawings, sketches, diagrams, etc). They look great on the house with the recommended light bulbs, although they are smaller than I thought (that's my fault for not paying attention). Very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Case

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised - lowest price
customer_reviews.text: This unit is precisely as advertised. They are smaller than the average/typical fixture, which is what we wanted for our small home. We sought this style, because it's more modern/contemporary than others, yet still square and with a completely open bottom. In FL we have zillions of bugs year-round and having to open/clean twice a year to remove dead bugs and moths was a hassle. Not when they die, they fall to the ground, not getting stuck inside a lamp casing. Brilliant! If you found this review helpful, please click the button...right there..THX.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Tampa

customer_reviews.title: NOT Weatherproof: this will rust
customer_reviews.text: I installed several of these a year ago (outside of our home) and although the listing describes them as "wet-proof" with "weatherproof seal", they are not. Ours were professionally installed on our exterior, so they do get exposed to the sun and rain (no snow, I'm in Hawaii). After several months, we noted that they started getting discolored (originally black colored), then rusted. They were very affordable, so it's not expensive to replace price-wise, but the time it will take to remove and replace them is annoying
customer_reviews.author: Kim Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I painted the back panel black. They are really small, probably wouldn’t look good on a bigger house.
customer_reviews.author: FN2187

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Whoohoo I'm super proud of myself for installing this all by myself. It was easy and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie kiser

customer_reviews.title: Instructions as absent as my love life
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I give this light fixture a four out of five stars. The instructions on how to install it, especially for a beginner like myself, we’re pretty much nonexistent. I had to figure out my own way of installing it and it took easily three hours. The screws that it came with were too big for the mount that I had so I had to get creative and switch the screws around. The end result has the screws still being too big in the end caps come out for too long but overall much better than what I had
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: I’m cheap and so is this light.
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s job and it was easy to install. Definitely worth the price. If I’d have paid more for it, it would get a waaay lower rating though. It was weirdly smaller than I imagined. Like, a shrunken version of a porch light. And it is not enclosed. The bottom remains open which is also odd but whatever... it’s a light. Seriously, though, seal around the fixture and the wall/exterior. It is not water tight and it does not come with a foam back or anything.
customer_reviews.author: That Creepy Cute Lady

customer_reviews.title: cheap porchlight
customer_reviews.text: for what you pay for this you cannot expect much and won't get much. mine arrived shipped only in the original box it came in and had minor damage. still worked but had to put a little of it back together. will not return because it is cheap and did work. i would not buy this item again but if you need a cheap light this is it. do know that they put no effort into seeing it arrives in good shape so you are on your own there
customer_reviews.author: ryobiguy

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my back garage door because I wanted something with clear glass for a motion sensing LED bulb. Simple installation with a drill bit into block home. I actually drilled it out a little wider and put anchors in first. Installed in half an hour, doesn't feel like the sturdiest light fixture but it works for what I need. Wouldn't use it for my front porch but can't beat it for $12
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with intentions of replacing my current garage area light post. This is way too small. Not sure where this could be used? I even tried to see if it would work for the back porch and it was also too small for that area. The price is low, so I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Felecia Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 to replace the old ones on our front patio and I love them! Super easy to install too! I didn’t like the instructions so I watched a quick YouTube video on how to replace these kinda lights haha Good price and good quality. Going to buy another 1 soon for our back deck!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great update to an old house
customer_reviews.text: Our house was built in the 60's and my grandparents do much updates. We had an old cabin style light on our porch. This has updated the look of the house and the door to our garage. My son installed it and it took him about 30minutes to do. A few wires had to be fixed due to the age of the house not the light.
customer_reviews.author: khuerta

customer_reviews.title: Small Porch Light.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced and old and decrepit porch light that really has seen its day. It looks nice, although I wish it was a little bigger. I may eventually get a larger one and transfer this to the front porch. This was my fault, as I didn't pay close enough attention to the dimensions. But you just can't beat the price, and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Joy de Leyer

customer_reviews.title: Simple Yet Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this simple yet nice porch light fixture. Had been looking to replace my old, cruddy one that was barely hanging and came across this great buy on Amazon. Quick and simple installation. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MizzKat

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple little light that works just fine for giving a little light on a walkway. Many houses have a narrow side which has a fence within 5 feet and a narrow sidewalk on the side of the house. This light is perfect for this application as it doesn't stick out so much and hit someone in the head. As the space is somewhat confined a smaller light looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Expert_Review

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The light I had up were probably 30 plus years old. So needed a update. These are cute. Smaller. But cute! They have a yellow back glass and clear glass on the sides. Easy to install but needed 2 ppl.
customer_reviews.author: ME♡

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Such a good purchase!!! Super cute and tiny, perfect to replace our hideous balcony lights that came with the place and hadn’t been replaced in 40 years! Cheap but look great! The gold reflective back gives off a nice shine.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Quick Install, but tiny light!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace our 30yr old fixture on our front porch. It went up quickly, had no issues with the install. I love the design & matte black finish - but it’s a tiny light! Not sure I’ll keep only because it looks so small next to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica bell

customer_reviews.title: No use
customer_reviews.text: I need back my money this thing is broken it has a broken glass
customer_reviews.author: Marco-Dane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just my style!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I bought these to replace much more ornate lights that the previous owners had installed. They were totally not me. These are plain and simple yet very modern and stylish. Just my style!
customer_reviews.author: DDF

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then you might think
customer_reviews.text: received the light in a small box. installed in front of my rental house which is small. Light worked as designed but wish it could have been larger. I need to read more carefully before clicking buy now. hope this review helps you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great Light for the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this up in a matter of minutes. It looks great with the black matte finish. Plus the clear glass allows for more light. I would highly recommend this product! Much easier to receive than the box stores!!
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Installation was a breeze and very straight forward. Lantern ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze and very straight forward. Lantern was smaller than anticipated and should be a part of the details in description. Other than size it is a nice little light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: j944

customer_reviews.title: Cute Patio Lantern
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it is metal and not plastic. I also really like that its easy to change the light bulb without taking it apart. Lights up the patio area fine. Just remember it is on smallish size, check dimensions. My son said it was easy to install. I'm very happy with it, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and very easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Needed a replacement light after my other one burnt out. Looks great for the price and sturdy enough to hold up to being outside. Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Rafe J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I purchased these lamps!
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing to dislike but if so, I’d say I wish they were a bit bigger and instructions were easier for those inexperienced installers. Overall they arrived fine with an intact packaging. I sprayed the glass to give a frosty effect and I loved the result.
customer_reviews.author: Jannicep

customer_reviews.title: Nice fixtures
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install for a handy 70 year old woman! Bought for price and easy bulb replacement. Used for back and side doors. Coordinate well with my front door and great price!
customer_reviews.author: linda v

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor light fixture was easy enough to install if you've done any basic electrical work. It was smaller than I expected but I should've read the product description more closely.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than id hoped
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped these would be more substantial but they did not meet my expectations. They do appear to be well made and would be good for another application. I just wanted something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: dimont

customer_reviews.title: Ok light.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three. Only got one by the grace of God. It works fine. Looks fine on back corner of house but the two I lights I ordered in it’s place for the front of house look much better.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Montalto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this in front and in the backyard. It is so simple but very efficient. We love it. I would highly recommend it. We used a led outdoor light and it brightens up the area.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Love the look! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and install easily. We bought two. They are perfect size for our back deck and add charm and comfortable lighting. Arrived on time and nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: CAG - NC

customer_reviews.title: beware
customer_reviews.text: The light fixture is fine, it replaced the same one I already had but it broke when a sofa was delivered. Unfortunately the bracket was not included and it did not line up to the existing bracket. of course i did not know this when i scheduled an electrician to install the fixture. so my electrician somehow rigged it to stay on the wall but it is by no means secure. I'm sure it will fall off as soon as someone bumps it.
customer_reviews.author: coalcanyon

customer_reviews.title: Works and was typically easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Circle frame was bent/dented on top. Otherwise it works and seems fine for replacing 30 year old plastic globe and metal fixture. Very badly packaged and shocked glass was intact. You may have to change your screws to fit new base. I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I can’t believe how nice these are for the price! The boyfriend was busy, so I installed them all myself. Easy install! I ended up ordering more to replace all my outdoor lights!
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Instructions were clear. These look nice, just make sure you read the dimensions because they are smaller than some other outdoor lights.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Great easy outdoor light fixtures!
customer_reviews.text: They are a little smaller than I imagined, but are perfect. I had huge ones that I had to remove 8 screws every time I needed to change a light bulb. These make it quick andneasy and still look elegant!
customer_reviews.author: KatieRose

customer_reviews.title: Made in China. You know how it goes.
customer_reviews.text: I guess you could say it’s a good value for the money. Cheapest outdoor fixture on Amazon so I got it. It provides plenty of light and does the job you need it to do. I noticed it was a little janky and cheap after the install. Seems real loose and sensitive to the touch after it’s up. But if you don’t touch it other than to change the bulbs it’s a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and installed easily, but only because there are only three wires and not because the instructions were understandable. A bit smaller than I was expecting, but it looks nice and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Thegreenlifesaver

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money but could use better quality control.
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor light looks very nice for the price I paid for it and functions well. My only complaint is that the socket is mounted crooked in the inside of the fixture which makes the bulb hang off center. I had to bend the socket to make it hang straight. The socket still isn't centered but at least the bulb is now. This probably isn't a problem with every light, just the one I happened to get. Overall I'm happy with the purchase, but give it 3 stars because of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: HTFam

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful - Small Outdoor Light -
customer_reviews.text: Very well made for the money. I have replaced several of my outdoor lights ,I needed a small one. Perfect size. You get everything you need to install. Some of my (Expensive Ones), did not have everything, this lamp came with.
customer_reviews.author: Byron  Alton

customer_reviews.title: Good little light
customer_reviews.text: Got this light to refresh our front door entrance. Small light but it was brighter than what I thought it was going to be. Overall pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: FzzyKttnPws

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Wish it were just a little larger but my husband loves the size. Put on front porch replacing motion lights we've tried 3 times but always seem to mess up after a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra W Austin

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t installed this yet but it’s very small. I thought it would be the size of a standar lamp and it’s about half that size. Will update once it’s installed to give a review of installation and performance.
customer_reviews.author: PeacefullySubjected

customer_reviews.title: A great investment that won’t hurt your budget
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were cheap and they looked good in pictures and when I installed them they were easy to install and work great and look great as well does their job and gives a better look to your porch. For the price you pay it’s a great investment that won’t hurt your budget
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: These arrived at my house completely shattered! They were rattling around in the box. Returned
customer_reviews.author: ThoussaintTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I really like that the bottom is open.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that the bottom is open. This should allow more heat dissipation. Also, it makes it super easy to replace bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: a_friend_usa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but small.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great quality but a little bit smaller than I expected! They definitely have a clean look!
customer_reviews.author: KNolan

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: We needed an outside fixture that was cheap for our house to replace a rusting old one. This is a good value, easy to install, and looks fantastic. I like that it doesn't have a bottom enclosure, since bugs usually get in our lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this yesterday on the back porch. Installed really easy, had all the extra parts for different applications. Instructions simple and easy to follow and recommend this to any DIYouselfer.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but looks fine in the side door location I have installed it. Came with all necessary installation accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Rick W

customer_reviews.title: Value, sturdy and easy bulb access
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and was easy to install. I bought this specific one because you can insert a bulb without taking it apart
customer_reviews.author: Jenece

customer_reviews.title: Porch Light
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace my motion light with. Light works great. Got tired of replacing my expensive motion light every few years.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel E. Gates Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Great light! It took only 15 minutes to install. Perfect for our back patio. Highly recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Mounting bracket didn't match up with holes. So have to buy new pieces. Also top screw on light with finshing piece broken off. Garbage. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Blondemountainlady

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I installed 7 of these to line a driveway. Exactly what I wanted. Extremely well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Harryk

customer_reviews.title: Installation easy
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much.Bought 2 to replace my old worn out ones.Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great light.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple yet very effective light fixture. It lets the light shine bright. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. So cheap they are not worth shipping back. Live and learn. Don’t waste your time or money
customer_reviews.author: Russell Reid

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing 45 year old lights on my porch. These are smaller and much more elegant looking. Though I hung mine upside down from the photo. They've been great.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Great Light for a Lite Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and DURABLE! Put it on my back porch for security. Mounting brackets included made it a snap to install.
customer_reviews.author: DEV

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute. I couldn’t install this as I measured wrong and it wouldn’t fit where I wanted it. My issue very nice looking light
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install and works as intended. It feels a bit flimsy, but looks like for a small entry way.
customer_reviews.author: FujiZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a rental home
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a decent lamp. Not a heavy duty, fancy fixture but it looks nice and was easy to put up. Perfect for a rental.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gianopoulos

customer_reviews.title: It seem like a nice light.
customer_reviews.text: it the light i want for my porch but after I ordered it it was broke by the mail people and sent back. i got a another one just like it in town.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the house, easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install! Made the house look much better! Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Nick deBos-Haigler

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! Super cute and is exactly what it looks like. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Sansburn

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cheap
customer_reviews.text: This does the job for the least money, which is why it's a bestseller. I'm not picky but I think it looks fine. Mounting hardware includes an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: a k

customer_reviews.title: **VERY NICE-LOOKING & A REAL BARGAIN**
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS VERY NICE LOOKING & AFFORDABLE PORCH LIGHT! It was less than $20.00 and my Handyman installed it in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: LuvMiracles

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with these lights!!!! Amazing price! I bought 3. One of the best things I ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Welovecats

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps
customer_reviews.text: Good lamps, definitely needed new ones on the back. They fit perfectly and look great. 4 stars only due to the bottom being open with no glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Cummings

customer_reviews.title: They're just okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for room build. I found them to be just okay...little on flimsy side.
customer_reviews.author: joseph grossman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Outdoor Light
customer_reviews.text: Light is very nice; however, you may find it a bit small for your application. If you are replacing a large outdoor light with this one, be prepared to see this one as a bit too small. But after awhile, the light size won't be as obvious...it just takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: steve s.

customer_reviews.title: Designers Fountain 1161-BK Value Collection Wall Lanterns, Black
customer_reviews.text: Went up fast and easey and with ohoto cell LED bulbs inside does everything that more expensive units do.
customer_reviews.author: leonard

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The inside didnt go up far enough to screw the top ring on that holds the whole light intact , I broke it to get it to work
customer_reviews.author: kim preston

customer_reviews.title: Cool lantern!
customer_reviews.text: We put this outside at our house, it's pretty small but good for the price. We spray painted the back panel black, it looks kind of weird being gold?
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks great! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bettyjane Lawley

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Light went out, bought a new one, this one works great. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Small, works as it should. Great for the price! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the simple design of this light fixture. We placed on the back patio of our home, and it looks great. The only reason I’m giving it four stars instead of five is because I didn’t initially realize the back panel was a brass-like gold. I ended up spray painting it black. We needed something really basic, and for this price, this fixture gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Blacklock

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I was anticipating. but still good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Keef

customer_reviews.title: Cute lamp but bulb is blinking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp three months ago. Easy to install but the light has started blinking. It is really annoying to have such a nice lamp with blinking light.
customer_reviews.author: Rodopa

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking lights
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace the old outside lights that came with our house. Updating lights really can make such a difference. They seem sturdy and according to my husband easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ogren‘s

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to replace old outside garage lights.
customer_reviews.text: They aren't fancy but work and look good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimo

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old ones for these stylish new ones, they truly look beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to putting this up and replacing a broken fixture outside my garage door. Easy to install. Nothing fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill W

customer_reviews.title: Who designed this thing?
customer_reviews.text: This would be a nice outdoor wall light IF the holes on the light would match the screws on the mounting plate, but they don't. Unless you want to drill your own holes this light is absolutely useless. Amazon, of course, was great in granting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Good little fixture
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought it would be, but it looks great and hooked up easily.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just painted our home and wanted to have all matching exterior lights
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Feliz

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixtures
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for the garage lights, and they look so much nicer than the original ones they installed on the house. The family loves them! They are a little smaller than the old lights, but they aren't too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kodabear0131
